body_html: Most model developers try to use the minimum precision necessary. Many (most?) models can be done with float32, and it is generally much faster. Adding float64 support everywhere doubles the amount of code to maintain and to have in a binary. That being said, if there is a strong reason, we would be happy to support float64 in spaces as needed. Could you elaborate on what you are trying to do?
